Please bear with me.
Okita was NOT close to Hijikata at all.

It's true tha=
t many believe Okita and Hijikata were like brothers based on Shiba 
Ryouta=
rou's FICTION. However, in history, Yamanami Keisuke was the vice-commander=
 
Okita shared a brotherly relationship with. It is debatable whether Okita=
 and Hijikata were 
even on good terms with each other.

If anyone's unsure=
 of it, accurate information could be found in HISTORICAL references. 


--=
